avastAppDesc.description: max 132 chars are allowed for this message
avastAppDesc.message: Find de bedste priser, tilbud og kuponer, når du shopper online, med prissammenligning og kuponforlængelse fra Avast.

avgAppDesc.description: max 132 chars are allowed for this message
avgAppDesc.message: Find de bedste priser, tilbud og kuponer, når du shopper online, med prissammenligning og kuponforlængelse fra AVG.

safePriceContinueShopping.description: It is showed to the user on the rating screen to offer the chance of continue purchasing

safePriceEnjoyQuestion_AVG.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceEnjoyQuestion_AVG.message: Er du glad for AVG SafePrice?

safePriceEnjoyQuestion_Avast.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceEnjoyQuestion_Avast.message: Er du glad for Avast SafePrice?

safePriceLeaveRating.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceLeaveRating.message: Bedøm os for at vise din kærlighed.

safeShopBestOfferSaving.description: %s will be the saving percentage of the best offer. Ex: SAVE 25%

safeShopPopularHotelIn.description: %s is the price + currency. Example: Popular hotels from 200,00 €

safeShopSimilarHotel.description: %s is the amount of hotels found. Example: 4 similar hotels

sasAdditionalFees.message: Yderligere takster og skatter kan gælde

sasGladYouLike.message: Godt, at du kan lide det!

sasHintBestOfferDesc.message: Gå direkte til den bedste pris for dette produkt.

sasOptionsDisableAll.message: Slå SafePrice fra på alle sider i 24 timer

sasOptionsEnableAll.description: Message that allow the user to enable SP if it was deactivated for 24H for all domains

sasOptionsEnableOnSite.description: Message that allow the user to enable SP if it was deactivated for 24H for one domain. %s: name of the domain

sasPromoDescription_AVG.message: AVG SafePrice finder de bedste tilbud på det, du leder efter, ved automatisk at sammenligne priser på hele internettet.

sasPromoDescription_Avast.message: Avast SafePrice finder de bedste tilbud på det, du leder efter, ved automatisk at sammenligne priser på hele internettet.

sasRecommendedOfferTitle.message: Denne pålidelige forhandler har gode priser, anmeldelser og giver kvalitetsservice.

sasSPTooltipText.message: Du vil se de bedste tilbud, når du søger i dine foretrukne webbutikker.

sasStartingPrice.description: %s is the minimum value off the price. Example: Starting at: $124.00
